fabric_message: Please update default.bandwidth.in.MBps property with network bandwidth in /opt/teradata/tdm-pma/application-prod.properties file of PMA pod before submitting assessment.
fabric_message_default: Please make sure that fabrics are enabled.
fabric_display: Detected network fabric configuration. Media server IP selection is not required.
source_message: Ensure that the correct environment is used as source for migrating data. Migration will disrupt ongoing activities in the system and adversely affect performance of databases.
target_message: Ensure that the correct environment is used as target for migrating data. Incorrect target environment will lead to data loss on the specified target
blockerMessageContent: Pre-migration assessment has detected issues that can fail the migration if not resolved.
Please review these issues, take appropriate action to resolve them, and perform assessment again.
